actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-300.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3642, a bill to extend for 3 fiscal years the programs under sec. 789 and title XII of the Public Health Service Act relating to emergency medical services and to authorize assistance for poison control and assistance centers.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3642 (Emergency medical services).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3642, a bill to extend for 3 fiscal years the programs under sec. 789 and title XII of the Public Health Service Act relating to emergency medical services and to authorize assistance for poison control and assistance centers.
